        Constructor for CredentialsWrapper.
        Parameters:
        hostURL - The Host IP of the MySQL server.
        hostPort - The Port used by MySQL server.
        dbName - Name of the database to connect.
        hostUsername - Username to connect to MySQL server.
        hostPassword - Password to connect to MySQL server.
